metadata.title: Ancient Fleet Chance
metadata.author: liamtripp
metadata.description:
Ancient Fleet Chance increases the chance of encountering an Ancient Fleet at a Harmony Link.
Requirements: - FTL: Multiverse 5.0+ - Load order: should go after FTL: Multiverse - Will conflict with mods that modify the eventList for HARMONY_LINK_EVENTS and HARMONY_LINK_SEP_EVENTS
